About the Company: TCM Ltd is engaged in the manufacture of of Potassium Chlorate  a vital raw material for the match Industry. In course of time the company diversified into a number of chemicals and established factories at Kalamassery in Kerala.The product range of the company includes Copper Sulphate,Copper Oxychloride and its formulations,Strontium Nitrate,Strontium Carbonate and Sodium Sulphide.
